attributes.action: Reverse the decision by KCC to register births and deaths in libraries
attributes.additional_details: KCC has recently decided that births and deaths should now be registered in libraries and Gateways instead of registry offices.If youve just lost a loved one its often a very distressing time. The last thing you want is to stand in line with people who want to take out a book, complain about missing benefit payments, etc etc. Its Barbaric. People who are in mourning should be entitled to some privacy and respect.
